text:
After getting the instructions from lord Shiva, Veerbhardra marched with a huge army which included the mighty Shivaganas like Dakini, Bhairav and Kapalish etc.
 Goddess Kali to joined him with her army which consisted of all her nine incarnations like Katyayani etc.
 As the army marched on numerous auspicious signs were visible.
title: Veerbhadra & Kali Assemble their Army
